tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"I cannot express enough gratitude for Dr. Biswajeet Naidu and his exceptional care for my ACL surgery. After consulting with several doctors, I chose Dr. Naidu because of his expertise, professionalism, and the confidence he instilled in me from our first interaction.

The surgery itself was a complete success. Dr. Naidu performed the procedure with precision and care, ensuring everything was done to the highest standard. His post-surgery instructions were clear and comprehensive, greatly aiding my recovery.

Before my surgery, I had heard of several cases from colleagues and acquaintances where ACL surgeries had gone wrong, or the recovery post-surgery was not up to expectations. These stories instilled a lot of fear in me. However, Dr. Naidu's approach and assurance helped alleviate those fears, and I felt I was in the best possible hands.

A significant factor in my decision to go with Dr. Naidu was his realistic and optimistic recovery plan. While other doctors recommended a six-week rest period, Dr. Naidu assured me that I could resume work in just two weeks. This was crucial for me as I had recently joined a new company and had constraints regarding leave. His confidence and guidance in this regard helped me tremendously on the job front, allowing me to return to work sooner than expected.

What truly sets Dr. Naidu apart is the remarkable recovery I experienced. Within just three months, I was able to walk without a stick and the need for a brace. This was a testament to the skilful surgery and the effective rehabilitation plan Dr Naidu provided.

My motor skills have significantly improved, and I am regaining strength and mobility at an impressive rate. Dr. Naidu was always available for follow-up appointments, and his encouragement and support were invaluable. He took the time to listen to my concerns and answered all my questions, which made a huge difference in my recovery journey.

I highly recommend Dr. Biswajeet Naidu to anyone in need of ACL surgery or any orthopaedic care. His expertise, dedication, and compassionate approach to patient care are truly exceptional. Thank you, Dr. Naidu, for giving me back my mobility and improving my quality of life.\

Doctor was very patient in hearing the concern and took time explaining the cause of the issue. He also highlighted the risk factors and asked detailed questions to suggest next steps. he outlined the treatment timeline and recovery duration so that was really helpful. 
Further, the consultation fee is different than what is listed here on Practo. He was clear about it and charged only what was listed on Practo. (actual consultation charge is Rs 1000). 
Overall, a good experience and a thorough doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I know Dr.Naidu since May 2005 when he treated my hand fracture. since then me and my family members visited and recommended n number of our relatives to him because he is an Excellent and very passionate doctor. I recently visited for my thumb fracture. He explained severity and agreed that we need to operate and place plate. Surgery was successful and I recovered from fracture easily. After recovery he helped me another surgery to remove plate.Thank You ðŸ˜Š

I had taken my wife who was suffering from ankle sprain and injury. The doctor is extremely friendly, enthusiastic and he may be an expert on knee / hip replacements. However, we were not satisfied with the treatment course he provided to my wife. He preferred quick fix solutions by giving some expensive 3 course injections amounting to 15k. **** **** **** ***** *** ** ****** *** *** ****** ********** We lost faith in this doc. 

** **** ******** ** ** ****** **** ***** ********  * ***** ******* *** *** **** ** ******** *** ***** *** **** **** ******* ******** ************
reply_text: Foremost I am happy that your wife responded to other treatment. Congratulations! Reality is that most patients in our clinic respond well to the given treatment.In fact it is extremely popular as the recovery is faster.Treatment was given with the sincere hope of good and quick result to this patient but Unfortunately she did not respond as most patients do! But then that is why there are so many treatment options for each condition/Disease in the human body and so also so many doctors in the same profession. So dissatisfaction and impatience among patients is known to happen and as result patients change doctors . But this is necessary so that you achieve your recovery target!Again faith is very difficult to achieve and easy to lose especially in the medical profession as you can lose faith in a treating doctor even if he or she has been treating you successfully for years together especially if you donâ€™t do well with a particular treatment at the present moment!

review:
Had take my Aunty to Dr Naidu , as she could not Walk and stand for a very long period of time. Dr Naidu consulted me for a knee transplant and we agreed to it. The operation was successful and now my aunt can  walk  and climb stairs also.i can see a lot of difference in her after the operation. 
Dr.Naidu is a very cooperative and a best consulter.

What an awesome human being. He made me to believe that great doctors are indeed their in this world. The kind of passion he showed towards what he is doing and how to help his patients is truly outstanding. Now even I want my son to become a doctor like him and serve the society. Thank you doctor.
reply_text: Thanks you sir.You made my day!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to him for back pain. The doctor is a very friendly guy and was very welcoming which i really liked about him. Even though my issue seemed very trivial for him, he listened patiently and genuinely seemed interested in explaining the issue to me rather than hurriedly write prescription and explain nothing. He made sure I left his office satisfied. I would recommend him to anyone wholeheartedly.
reply_text: Thanks Mr.Higgins Wilson!!You made my day!!Patients like you make it really worth doing this work! God bless you and pray that you make a speedy recovery from your condition!

review:
Doctor was very good and he is very charming. After listening everything whatever he said, I found that i was taking unnecessary so much tension... In other words he is having very cool nature.....
Doctor should be like this bcoz anyone go to doctor he already feared so much thing but he said so many things that dis is normal why u r tsking tension  like dis he said  and don't take tension..... :)
reply_text: Thank you Mr.Rahul Tripathi for your kind words!

review: Me with my mom visited his clinic for same issue - knee pain...his total experience speaks for him..very calm, understandable****************shared his opinion on the issue very clearly n then given couple of options of treatment..very good doc n would recommend to all those who are suffering from joint issues..

I had visited Dr. Biswajeet for my wife's Cervical Spine problems. I found the doctor to be super skilled with his impressive detailed diagnosis, *** **** *** ********* *** ** ******* *** ******** ** *** ******* *** ******* ****** ** ********* **** ******* 
Another good thing about the doctor is that he ensures the patient clearly understands what is causing the problem; and his style of explaining and putting you at ease is highly commendable. 
A very approachable doctor - highly recommended.

review: It was such a pleasure meeting this doctor.  It's been really long I have come across such a pleasant and friendly doctor.  He took out the time to diagnose and clearly explain the issue.  What I liked the most was his simple ways of treating and mild medication.  I highly recommend Dr Naidu and would surely visit him for any orthopedic issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Really I was thankful to God that I was at right place before right person whom I believe you can really trust. His straight forward nature and simple way of explaining the depth of injury was awesome. I think such Doctors are very few in this world. I would recommend my friends and relatives to visit him as one can trust 200 % and get well soon.

It is very good. He explained everything in detail. He is absolutely patient friendly and highly confident about the treatment. He has suggested few medicine and I have to visit again after ten days. I hope my wife's problem will be resolved.
This is my second visit to Doctor.  This time for my mother. Very warm person.you feel safe and comfortable with him
Very helpful & friendly doctor, who understand petients physical as wel as financial problems, very glad to meet him.
Very good experience. I am thoroughly satisfied and look forward to coming here for follow up and any other orthopedic issues. Very friendly , understanding and professional treatment. Thanks
